reviewDescription: Lightweight, sleek model, space-saving, works well.I chose pink, however it is more of a dark rose, so there's that.

reviewTitle: Great, affordable hairdryer with a couple caveats
reviewDescription: This is a great little hairdryer, with a couple caveats.  It does feel a little cheap; however, I am through buying super expensive luxury hairdryers, as they break just as often as the cheaper ones.  I bought a very pricey hairdryer that only lasted 2 years!  So from now on, I'm buying affordable dryers, as I'm pretty hard on them.  This little dryer has excellent heat and speed control.  There are three reasons I gave it 4 stars:  1) I have very curly hair, so mainly use the diffuser attachment, and it's very small compared to most curly hair diffusers.  It also blows the air a little harder than I like, but it still works pretty well.  2) There were some rough edges on the teeth of the diffuser the first time I used it, and they were catching my hair and pulling it.  I scraped those off and it's been smooth sailing every since.  3) No hanging loop.  Overall, I recommend this dryer, just be aware that it does have a cheap feel and a very small diffuser for curly hair.

My mother does not hold back when she like's something so here is what she described to me, turned to words the best I could. My mom seemed to be in love with her new Wavytalk Professional Hair Dryer I gave her as a Mother's Day gift. As someone with curly hair, she struggled with finding a dryer that enhances her natural waves without causing frizz. This dryer is a total game-changer.The diffuser attachment is amazing! It helps to define and dry her curls without leaving them crunchy or frizzy. The dryer itself is powerful but doesn't feel too heavy. The ionic technology is a definite plus as it leaves hair feeling soft and smooth. Plus, it dries hair surprisingly fast.We are impressed with this product and would highly recommend it to anyone with curly or wavy hair! Or with hair, period!

I’ve only used this blow dryer once and it works really well for the value. It’s lightweight and has a cool setting. It’s a little loud especially when using the highest setting, but luckily I can blow dry my 4c natural hair in under 40 minutes using it. I only wish the comb attachment had smaller bristles in order to get the hairs on the ends a little straighter.

I like it because it’s light weight as I have weak forearms due to wrist deformity, though it’s not not as powerful as my previous one, it came with a diffuser which I needed for my curly hair and couldn’t find one to fit my other dryer. The only drawback that my other one did is that it doesn’t fold in half so I had to find a different place in bathroom to but it. That would be my only negative.
I like the size of this hair dryer. Works well and gets the job done. Occasionally mine makes a funny whistle noise, though. I am not sure if there is a defect or if they all sound like that.

I like the size and weight of the dryer. The settings are easily accessible. There are 3 heat settings and 2 power settings. When the high heat setting is used on the lower speed it’s not as hot as when used in the highest speed setting. I’d like it better if the lower speed was hotter. The high speed tangles my hair too much.

This dries very quickly.  I gave it 4 not 5 stars because it isn't as hot as others I have had.  Love that it is light weight and easy to manage.  It leaves my hair nice and soft and less frizzy than others I have used.  I would recommend.
I love this new hair dryer as it is great for drying curly hair without causing frizz and without straightening the curl!

This is a good dryer but I don’t understand all the hype which got me to buy it. I have wavy hair and the diffuser does a good job. I do wish the diffuser was locked into place instead of loosely spinning around because I used to like to put it against my scalp and turn it diff directions to get a lifted look. With this I must lift my hair with my hand to do what I need. The paint is super thin and even though I don’t throw it around, the dryer has lots of scrapes on it. So the cute pink grey is now pink grey and black (scrapes). It’s lightweight and balanced in my little hand. The cord is sufficiently long. I’m keeping it because it does the job, but I’m not all rave about it like others are.

reviewTitle: Broke in less than a month :/
reviewDescription: This dryer was worked pretty well although it caused me to blow a fuse 4 times. I started unplugging everything else when using to avoid blowing the fuse and that helped but then all of a sudden it stops working mid use. I feel the plug and it is SCORCHING hot. I tried the test on the plug box and it failed making a buzzing noise. It’s been a few days now and still doing the same and won’t turn on.Im glad it didn’t cause a fire it seems like it could’ve happened had it not turned itself off but it did break from that. I was using it for over 30 mins at that point so I think it just shorted out and died. It worked pretty well before that and I’ve only used 10 times or less so I’m not sure what happened although it is quite cheap so seems like a get what you pay for situation. Maybe worth investing in a better one.My revlon brush dryer (around the same price) works way faster and better and have not had any issues of blowing a fuse or it shorting out regardless of how long I’m using it. Buy that instead of a standard dryer like this one

This travel blow dryer is powerful and easy to pack. Beware — the suction end is incredibly strong and if you have curly hair like I do and diffuse your hair upside down, be careful to not let your hair get anywhere near the suction end … it’ll end up inside the dryer and can possibly be ripped from your head. My hair ended up tangled inside and I had to cut it out. Because of this and how I need to use the dryer, it’s a pass for me. If you don’t flip your head upside down (curly haired people know what I’m talking about) then you should be ok.

reviewTitle: It worked good until it didnt. VERY POOR QUALITY.
reviewDescription: I bought this dryer for my wife and daughter. At first, it worked good until it stopped working after just 4 months. My wife was using it and she said it started to overheat. She said it shut off and didn't start back up. I tried to find warranty information on it, but is non existing. Save your money and buy something else that will work better. I remember being a child and my mom had a cheap hair dryer that lasted her over 20 years. This one only lasted 4 months. VERY POOR QUALITY. Will not ever buy again from this brand.

I’m going to be generous and give one star for being compact and one star for the magnetic attachments.I purchased this dryer for an upcoming vacation (didn’t want to haul my big one with me) so the first time I turned it on was at the hotel. It lasted maybe 15-20 seconds then blew up. Literally. It singed my bangs and blew the fuse in the hotel room. What the heck?! Since I purchased it in advance plus had to wait to get home, I’m outside the 30 day return window. Bummer. I had high hopes for this hair dryer.

This is my second purchase(bought awhile ago but just opened recently) and appears same problem exists. After several months of using, the heat setting won't go to high- seems "stuck" on medium and the air is almost warm-cool. High heat np longer works!  Thought first one I purchased maybe was a lemon but the same thing is happening again. I like the dryer but not worth it to have the same thing happen again. I have shoulder length hair so it's not like I've had the dryer on forever......search is on for new brand!

reviewTitle: DEAD after 4 uses, less than 6 weeks, now the Product us useless with No Customer support
reviewDescription: Defective product. The product is dead after 3 - 4 uses within 6 weeks, and outside the return window, Amazon is not helping with the issue, referred to reach out to external support on to their website. When we try to get Product support, This item is not eligible for this service.If you need help with this product, visit Amazon’s Customer Service Help page. Amazon customer service is even not taking accountability referring to warranty which doesn't even exists.DO NOT Waste your time and money on this Product, not worth it totally.

I used this dryer sparingly only my daughter's hair to keep it healthy. It stopped working mid-drying session after about 1.5 months. I let it rest for a couple of hours before trying it again and it started smelling like burning plastic. The heated coil inside was glowing red (even on the cool setting), but the fan just gave up. I'm not willing to give this another try because now it's a safety issue for my child. Unfortunately, this was just outside of the return window and I'm stuck with useless clutter.

Used the blow dryer for just under 120 days and the plastic is melting. I use the dryer for my beard and hair (not much up top daily) so not exactly a whole bunch. When the blow dryer says it has technology to regulate temperature - I'm not convinced Additionally, I am trying to reach out to seller regarding a warranty claim and it hasn't been easy to find a way to reach out to them to see what's up.

reviewTitle: CRAP Stopped working after less than 1 hour (total) of use
reviewDescription: So cute but crap. Loved it the first time I used it (maybe 30 minutes). The second time I tried to use it, it cut off after about 15-20 minutes. IT HAS NEVER TURNED BACK ON. Tried resetting GFI plug. NO GO. Complete waste of money because I had to leave on a trip and so I didn't immediately contact Amazon. Now I missed the 30-day return window, so I guess I'm poorer but wiser.

reviewTitle: Turned on and stopped working after 30sec!
reviewDescription: Unfortunately the item worked for all of 30 seconds before shutting off and never powering back on. There was an awful smell when unpacking, as if it had already been used and fried hair. I took the chance to try it out but unfortunately could never get it to start back up.Of note: the weight of the dryer is great and the cord length is decent. The diffuser was not deep enough for my liking. The air holes in the diffuser were also quite large - this can often cause frizz on my curly hair

reviewTitle: Love the dryer but cheap attachments
reviewDescription: The Dryer does what it need to do. It dries my hair and wigs very well. I use the comb attachment the most. I have had the dryer for within a month, Brussels on the comb broke off; within in about 2 months, the clip on the attachment broke to the point where it will not grip. It’s hard to find a replacement on here. Don’t work with other attachments.

At first when I bought this product I was a little skeptical but once I received it I put it to the test and it was great! You can use it as a hair diffuser if you want to define your curls or if you simply want to dry your hair. It is also not as big as a usual hair dryer so if you travel a lot this tool is definitely travel friendly! Great product, I loved it.
Dries my hair fine! Love the diffuser
It works, drys hair reasonably fast. I bought it as a gift for my gf, got it on sale and she says it works well and likes it. So can’t complain I’d recommend if you find at a good price.

It works the same as any cheap basic blow dryer. I don't like that you can hear the fan unwine after powering it off. I do like the three settings for heat and speed. Kind of heavy. Otherwise works the same as a $15 conaire brand.
I love the color and how light it is…. Wish cord was a little longer

This product is so great! I had gotten my hair done by a professional stylist who specializes in curly hair (which is what I have. I have half wavy and half curly) and she used a Dyson or something. I know it was an expensive hair dryer/diffuser. And I had been on the search ever since then and I got something that is less pricy (this product) and it’s the same thing! It’s definitely a tad bit louder but it works pretty great to me! It’s super easy to hold and super easy to pack away for travel or storage. So yea it’s super great I 100% recommend!!
Works well, seems quicker then my old dryer. I wouldn't say it any quite of a dryer. If so it's not noticeable to my old Revolon.  Use a heat protector as the high setting is very very hot.

I’ll start out with my only complaint - location of the buttons.  I have found I hit the cold blast button inadvertently and sometimes hit the other ones while drying.  My daughter and I have thick hair so I usually have a death grip on the dryer and I am just really easily hitting those buttons.  Kind of annoying.  Other than that I love this dryer for the quick dry on my hair and the add-ons for different styling.  My last dryer (different brand) burned out within a year so hoping this one actually lasts.  We will see!

reviewTitle: Not as quiet as I would have liked, but great smaller hair dryer.
reviewDescription: FAR from the quietest hair dryer on the market, but the heads stayed nice and tight despite heating up quite a bit with use. If you're looking for a cute, affordable dryer, this one is a good choice for the price point.
I bought this to replace a dryer I had for several years. Purchased in March 2024, it stopped working the 1st week of July. I only used it 2-3 times per week. Extremely disappointed….
Comb attachment is flimsy. The base cracked after having it for 7 months. Customer is not available for getting a replacement.
This was great until it started shorting out and literally blew up in my hands. Flame and sparks shot out of it. I'm lucky I didn't get seriously hurt. Do not recommend this blowdryer.

Had this hair dryer for approx 3 months, it was operating normally and did a nice job drying hair but this morning a flame came out of the base where the wire goes into the dryer. Scared the hell out of my wife and the unit stopped. This shouldn’t happen on a unit 3 months old. Very disappointed. I am outside of the window to return it but hoping the manufacturer sees this review and stands behind their unit.
I had this for 4 months and I don’t dry my hair every day. Just died and started smoking.
Stopped blowing hot air after 1-2 months.

I ordered this hairdryer on the 26th of October. It worked rather loudly from the start but it didn't concern me as I thought it was just the type of hairdryer. I plugged the hairdryer into the same plug when using it and before Christmas I tried it in a different plug in the house and it tripped the fuse. This proceeded to happen when using the dryer in any plug other than the one I have used for the first couple of weeks. Seems to be some kind of electrical issue and its now too late for me to return the product...
Product will not turn on.
It was working great initially but the heating strength decreased all of a sudden and it doesn't dry the hair anymore. Would have wanted it to last longer than this.
Its broken after a year

I love this blower! It’s compact, dries my hair quickly and looks great! So worth the money! I did notice that it was missing one of the attachments. I had already used the blower so I figured it was too late to return it even though I still have the box. I should’ve been more vigilant. It is wonderful though, overall.
I like it. It came with a little scratch, but no big deal. Does the job
I did just receive my dryer, but first use it did take longer than 5 minutes to dry my hair.  Haven’t used any other of the attachments yet
It works really well. Only reason not a 5 is it is kind of heavy and a short cord.

I have long hair, down to my waist and it dried my hair in like 5 minutes.  I used the comb attachment and switched to blow attachment with ease and never turned the dryer off.The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because it is a bit loud.  But dealable.

Love this and all the attachments it comes with. It has different heat settings and hair settings. I have thick curly frizzy hair, and this doesn't make my hair frizzy. Dries quickly and when using the hair attachments make my hair look great. The purple color was a plus. Will repurchase and/or buy for gift

This hair dryer is small but powerful. It is sleek and has three different control seating of temperature. The cord is long enough for me to move around and the attachment are great for when I am in a rush.
The air wasn’t as cold as expected but other than that I like it and the style is cute and easy to hold. The functions are also nice
I was excited about this hairdryer but disappointed that one of the main attachments is chipped and dirty. It seems to have a sticky film on it.

The dryer, diffuser, and towel are all PERFECT for the price, but the brush is absolutely horrible. Used once for a blowout and it tangled my hair and created the biggest knot. Threw it out immediately. But besides that, everything else is great!

reviewTitle: Small lightweight Hair Dryer for Travel
reviewDescription: I decided on this hair dryer as I was looking for something small and lightweight.  It checked both the boxes on that.  It is not super powerful so if you are looking for something that will give you the blowing power of a more expensive brand this might not be for you.  It does the job though, quickly and efficiently.  Glad I made the purchase.

reviewTitle: Cute and gets the job done. I’d recommend.
reviewDescription: pros: lightweight, made my hair shiny, comes in nice colors, dries my hair relatively fast, and comes with 3 attachmentscons: while the other 2 attachments pop right off when needed, the comb attachment is very hard to get off. i had to look up a video on how to.its easy to accidentally be pressing the cool shot button and the grip in general isn’t the best because i have to be conscious on where i put my hands so i don’t accident knock up the heat or turn down the speed.
Cute small and powerful product

This hair dryer I’ve had for two days  so far it’s been amazing. It literally takes no more than 10-15 to dry my hair.  It doesn’t  leave my hair frizzy or feeling wet.  It instantly dries my hair quick. Leaves a bit of shine to the hair. Its  not heavy to hold which I like. Doesn’t have any heat sitting which I don’t mind cause it already heats hot enough for me. Yeah it’s loud but not to the extent it over does it, so the noise doesn’t really bother me. I say you have to try it for yourself and if you don’t like it, just return it simple as that.
Very light weight and fairly quiet. I bought this for my mom and she’s really liked it so far. She said it dries her hair fast.
I like how it is small, yet powerful, quick and easy to use and it gets through mine and my daughter's thick hair
Really give my hair a shine and easy to manage; especially for someone who had arthritis.  Good product.

I asked my hairdresser for suggestions on a hairdryer and she recommended this one. I have never had a dryer this great and my mom also ordered one after my review and she loves hers!! If you have curly or frizzy hair, you need this pro-type dryer!!
I like the dryer,  works well i use it on my hair and my daughter's. My hair is thick and course, My  hair is a lot more manageable using this dryer.

This is by far the best blow dryer I have bought. It dries your hair extremely fast. With the different attachments it cuts down some time especially with the comb attachment. I also love all the different settings. The cool setting actually gets cool. I would definitely recommend this product.

reviewTitle: Dying after 2 months. Weird noise and smell
reviewDescription: I really loved this dryer for the two months it worked. It now is making a weird noise like something is stuck in it (very screechy loud noise) and I’m no longer able to use it.I tried to record the sound and it made a DIFFERENT SOUND (see attached video) and started smelling like smoke.I am hoping to get in contact with WavyTalk for assistance

This blow dryer looks like the newer more advanced hair drying blow dryers, but it’s not! It’s loud, takes a long time to dry my hair for 2 to 3 times the money. Save your money and don’t buy this one!

The air was so hot and intense during the first use that I put it on its lowest heat setting. Used to to blow-dry only my bangs for about 90 seconds and the plastic on the front completely melted. Definitely do not recommend.

reviewTitle: I got one of the ones that doesn't work properly.
reviewDescription: I expected it to be powerful based off of the reviews but when I got the hair dryer it was much weaker than expected. I had an old hair dryer that was very cheap and it was much stronger than this one
I order this products a few months ago for a rainy day. The “rainy” day came yesterday and oh surprise: it doesn’t work.  Definitely learned a lesson… always check upon arrival!  :(

reviewTitle: The hot cycle eventually wears out
reviewDescription: This hair dryer is dangerous. If it’s set to hot setting it sparks and blows cool air which is not powerful despite being on high. I threw mine out for fear of catching fire

reviewTitle: Already broke 6 months after buying it
reviewDescription: This hair dryer was great at first but I noticed it started losing power about 4 months after buying it and now, 6 months after I bought it, it doesn’t have the same power AND it isn’t blowing hot air anymore.I don’t even blow dry my hair every day and I’m the only one using it so it definitely shouldn’t have broken after 6 months.Now I have to buy another hair dryer. Ugh

I’ve had this hair dryer for 6 months and it’s no longer blowing hot air. It turns on and blows cold air but not warm or hot. I use the hairdryer about 2-3 times a week. It should have lasted much longer than 6 months! Unfortunately, I’m well past the return window now. I would not recommend this product.

This hair blower is a piece of junk. It does not get hot enough to dry hair. The box came in the mail all tapped up with all kinds of tape. I should have not opened it. I tried to use it once and then put it away on the closet. I feel really bad that I lost $35. Getting really disappointed with Amazon. A couple weeks ago my husband got some expensive Blue dog food and it was totally tapped up. I really do not want to give it to my dog, but he would not take it back or complain.
The dryer worked great for two weeks then it started making a noise like it was falling apart on the inside. It will blow hard then it will quit blowing.
This is not for course hair. Does not get hot enough and takes long drying time. The appearance is nice but I would not recommend.
Bought the hair dryer for my mother, she used it a few times it never blew any hot air! Then the safety plug stopped working so now it does not turn on.I should have know better, don’t buy it

I was so excited for the blow dryer. I did so much research into getting a new dryer due to the fact I’ve used the same kind for probably 10 years. I finally decided to get a different kind. I read 85% of the reviews on this one so I chose it. I have an incredibly thick head of hair but based of reviews this dryer is powerful. It is not! It unfortunately wouldn’t even blow/move my hair. This could just be a bad one I’m not sure but at this point I’m not willing to risk it. Something is up with the heat as well. It’s not getting near as hot as it should be.
I’ve had this for less than a year and it stopped heating. Waste of money, incredibly frustrating because now it is essentially useless
I used it for a month and it stopped working
Have had this since October 2023 and it just stopped working. Only blows cold air now. Have had less than a year.
This hairdryer had great settings except it was heavy to use compared to other hairdryers. I wouldn't recommend due to the weight.

reviewTitle: It broke in under one month
reviewDescription: I thought this was going to be the perfect hairdryer, but it is not well-made and it’s already making terrible noises within the motor compartment and I am one day past the return limit. :-(.
The blow dryer motor died after the third use.

I ordered two of these dryers within the same month of each other. After less than one month of daily use the dryer started sparking and would turn from hot to cool air. Tried the second one and did the same thing. I lost $80 on these two dryers within one  month! Amazon would not give me a refund since they said it was past the return window. Do not buy this dryer if you intend to use it daily!!!!

I picked this hair dryer in November of last year (it is now late August) with the hope that it would replace my old Revlon dryer and look a bit more sleek. Ultimately, it had too many problems and I have just ordered a replacement. But I hope my experience can prove useful.The first issue with the dryer was that it lacks a loop. I hang up my dryer with a loop, and I should have known right away this was going to be irritating to me - especially given that part of the reason for the purchase was aesthetic.The second issue was that it didn’t seem to be even a mild improvement from my prior hairdryer even though that one cost a fraction of this one. It wasn’t faster. It wasn’t quieter. It was weaker, so I did find it was better on my hair, but I’d rather have a full speed dryer I can just make cooler.The last issue developed over time. Within the last few months, I’ve noticed that the handle gets hot. Others have mentioned that here as well, so it’s not just a lemon. Something about this dryer is sending heat into the handle, and it’s deeply concerning to me. I have a sneaking suspicion something is about to break or melt in the unit, and I don’t want to risk it happening while I’m using it.Honestly, I’d just stick to the more reputable brands. These private-label brands are a dime a dozen on Amazon, but you’re not actually getting a deal. Get a reliable hair dryer from a reliable brand that will stand behind their product.

reviewTitle: Only great if you have a lot of time on your hands or extremely thin hair
reviewDescription: I own and LOVE the CONFU 2200w. But it's a bit heavy for traveling. I wanted a more compact/lightweight  but affordable option for travel. (Overweight bag fees suck when you have a heavy dryer)  SO in my search i came across the Wavy talk hairdryer and it seemed super promising after looking at tons of other options.. it filtered in the high wattage category somehow but now i see it is only 1500 watts but plenty of thick haired ladies gave it great reviews. My only assumption is that their hair either is not very thick or they have not experienced the magic of a 2200w hair dryer. I know the new technology of the dyson type hair dryers have lower wattage so it still should have been slightly better than it was. But at the rate of dying time the WavyTalk dryer gave me i may as well not pack a dryer and use the conair cheepy hair dryer that come in a lot of hotel rooms. But vacation time is precious and i don't want to spend an hour in my room blow drying my hair if i have a special event i need to use it - most of the time i will let y hair go au naturale curly/wavy but i want a hair dryer with me just in case which is why its important it was not heavy. which it wasn't too heavy but its lightweightness didn't match the weak drying.

reviewTitle: Disappointing. Not faster, not really quieter, and much heavier than my 25 year old hair dryer
reviewDescription: This hair dryer did not live up to the hype.  I purchased it to replace my 25 year old revlon hair dryer. I was hoping for a quieter, faster drying time with a cool air option.  The cool air option was really the only success in my view. Both dryers are 1875W, but the wavytalk takes much longer to dry my hair than my old dryer, even after I turned the heat to max. It also doesn't sound any quieter than my old dryer. I measured with a sound meter app, which said that the wavytalk is 85db on high/cool setting and not the 69db claimed in the ad above. The old revlon is 88db.  Last, old dryer is 10.5oz and this new one is 15.5oz, much heavier.  I don't see enough benefit over my old hair dryer to justify replacing it, so will send this back.

I loved this little hair dryer when I got it. I liked the size. I liked the short snout because I didn't feel like the attachments made it longer than my arm. It dried quickly and it wasn't damaging my hair. I was a pretty big fan all around.  After a couple of months the temperature became very inconsistent with only short bursts of heat even when it was on the highest setting. Then I started to notice a weird noise every time I shut it off and that continued for a few months. I should've realized that it was a sign of a bigger issue. I'm saddened to report that this hair dryer died in my arms this morning approximately 35% through my hair routine. I was mildly inconvenienced at the time but that grew exponentially when I realized that I'd  only purchased it about 6 months ago. I would never expect to be able to use the same hairdryer for 30 years like our foremothers but come on! I didn't even use it every day! 3/10 would not recommend.

This blow dryer is certainly not for thick or coarse hair. The attachment is a lot smaller than I'd hoped and it has a burnt smell on high. The placement of the buttons is strange if you intend to hold it eith the handle and its too hot to hold it by the head. Dont like the way hair feels after either. Got it to replace my pattern blow dryer because its wuite heavy but I dont think this is it.

I’m not sure why there are such good reviews on this. For starters, it doesn’t have great blowing power. However even though it didn’t have good blowing power, it didn’t seem to take any longer than my other hair dryers did to dry my hair. The second big fail was the placement of the button slides. I kept pushing them up or down constantly. Unfortunately I will be returning this.

Loved it at first! Feels great, works great, attachment heads are great. However after just one month of use it broke. I only dry my hair once or twice a week at most so haven’t even used it very many times. I heard something pop inside the dryer about a week ago but everything still worked so didn’t think much about it. But today while drying my hair the whole thing just stopped. The heating element still works, but it no longer blows out any hair. Very disappointing!

reviewTitle: I would not recommend the product
reviewDescription: I purchased this hair dryer since it was less bulky than my Conair and the Ionic feature was appealing. The size is great, easy to handle. It doesn’t feel to heavy that my arm gets tired from blow drying my hair. It comes with two add-ons, a concentrator and a difusor. It also isn’t as loud as an older hair dryer which is a nice feature as well. The reason I would not recommend this product is because your hair gets sucked in and caught on the motor on the back of the hair dryer. I have never had this issue before and it is become an issue every time I use this product. I began to notice this issue when I would use the difusor. I have long, curly hair so I enjoy using the difusor option. I was bending over, had my hair flipped over my head and began diffusing my hair. Since you have to diffuse your roots, I moved the hair dryer close to my root which the rest of my hair fell over the hair dryer. I started to feel a tug on my hair and noticed that the motor on the back of the hair dryer had pulled my hair in. Even though the hair dryer has a cap that covers the motor, it still is able to pull your hair through. Additionally, since my hair ended up getting caught in the motor, the strands started to burn. Even if you remove the cap, you can’t access the motor so I was unable to pull the strand of hairs out from the motor. When I use the hair dryer now, it emits a burnt smell since my hair is still wrapped into the motor. It’s unfortunate that you can’t use this hair dryer to its full capabilities. It also raises a concern that the motor can get tangled in the strands of hair it sucks in. I should be able to place the hair dryer in and out of my hair to be able to properly diffuse so not be able to diffuse my hair makes me regret buying this hair dryer. I would prefer to spend more money on a quality product that works to its full capacity.

Worked fine until it didn't.  30 day warranty not enough as the hairdryer stopped working after 6 weeks.  Quality not there for long term use.  Beware, you may be stuck with buying another one when your's dies.

I’m still uncertain how I feel about this dryer. I was expecting faster dryer time with less frizz. Have used 4 times and so far no less frizz. As for drying time, no different than my conventional dryer.

reviewTitle: one nozzle dirty one nozzle can't take out
reviewDescription: the small nozzle came in without any package and dirty. the other nozzle once click in, can't take out. this may not impact the effectiveness of the hair dryer. but the improper design and cosmetic problem really make it a return, and not sure if i will buy any product' from the company

Bought this dryer back in March expecting it to last at least a year like my other dryers have- motor shut down on me 3 months later. Not surprised the return time is only 1 month after purchase. I’m tired of buying $40 dryers that crap out on me after only a few months of usage. If you’re looking for a dryer that’s going to last you, this one isn’t for you.

reviewTitle: Quit working after a few blow drys
reviewDescription: I loved the dryer when I first started using it. Last time I used it, the dryer glitched and went half power before shutting of completely. My return window is closed, as I waited to long to unbox it and start using it. Only used it a handful of times.

reviewTitle: Missed the mark with quality control
reviewDescription: Recieved Used-Defective blow dryer. First clue, there was an issue should have been the packaging.  Plactic wrapping was in the bottom of the box. Burnt smell to unit, persists even when not in use.  Wasn't albe to use long to see if it was any good.

reviewTitle: Only worked for 6 months, now only blows cold air. - UPDATE was given a refund by seller!
reviewDescription: UPDATE:  The seller contacted me and offered me a refund or a replacement, stating they stand behind their product and they think I just got a lemon.  I appreciate the seller doing this so much, it shows that they stand behind their products and do the right thing.I bought this hair dryer in January of 2023.  It worked fine, nothing special, but no complaints.  It is small and compact and did the job.  It did not have the greatest blowing power, even on the highest setting, but it was ok.However, today when I went to use it the heat setting would not work.  It will only blow out cold air, no matter what setting I try.  It only lasted 6 months!  I am so disappointed.  I take great care of my products.  The dryer hung on a hook in my bathroom.  I have pretty wavy hair and the majority of the time I let my hair air dry, I probably only use the blower dryer once a week for about ten minutes and with that little use, it still stopped working that fast.  Very poor quality.

I liked that it was supposed to be less noisy than a traditional hair dryer. But I never even got to see for myself because the one I received doesn’t work! I’m very disappointed. I really needed something to help dry my thick and curly hair.

Lo malo: Me duró dos meses y dejo de funcionar. Es pesado para un secador chico como lo describen. El ruido es el de un secador normal.Lo bueno: seca tu pelo en 10 minutos si lo tenes a media espalda de largo

DON’T DO IT. I just bought this hairdryer a month and a half ago, and tonight the motor broke down and blew sparks out the barrel. I could smell the inside burning itself and it would have caught on fire if I hadn’t quickly pulled it out of the outlet. It’s no wonder the return window is only 1 month…joke’s on the buyer, clearly. HARD PASS.Update: I’d like to acknowledge that the company did reach out and refund my purchase, so the company gets a 3 stars. However, I still wouldn’t recommend this hair dryer.

Very cheap material. The attachment was so hard to remove. The item didn't was not in Amazon box. The item was left outside the mailroom. It was outside the mailroom bldg which anyone could have stolen the packages
Be careful purchasing..mine was obviously used. There was hair and dandruff on one of the attachments and inside the bag that was holding it.

After 1-1/2 months, and only used about 10 times, the hair dryer overheated after less than 1 minute on and stopped working. Window for return is closed they only give you a month to return.Buyer beware
This product broke the day after the return window closed. I tired restting the device, but it only makes a burning smell. Not recommended.
I’ve had this for one day and it’s already giving me issues. After drying one side of my head it dies and I have to wait before being able to continue. You get what you pay for I guess.
Great product but it is missing a piece.  There are supposed to be 3 attachments and only 2 were in the box.

reviewTitle: Sparks shot out and stopped working
reviewDescription: I was just in the middle of drying my hair when suddenly it stopped working. Good thing I took it away from my head to see what happened,  maybe it unplugged I thought? I turned it off,  and back on and sparks flew out and burned my wrist. Before this it worked nicely,  but after that, I don't recommend this product.

Unfortunately, this blow dryer arrived broken and appears to actually be used. Will be returning this right away.I was trying to replace a $250 blow dryer that still works but is outdated, I’ve had it for 10 years and just wanted something new.I guess you really do get what you pay for.This blow dryer feels super light, which is not great. As you can see, it’s made of cheap plastic and broke before it even got to me. Although, the breakage could’ve been from someone else using it as it does look like it was already used.Super disappointed, will continue to search for a new blow dryer.

I ordered this hair blow dryer after seeing great reviews and after seeing that this was an Amazon pick. It’s a sleek design with a variety of different attachments and I was excited to try it out. I plugged it in and turned it on and immediately smelled a chemical burning smell. Oh well, it’s new, I thought, and I haven’t had a hair blow dryer in awhile, maybe this is just how it smells. Well the smell got worse and plumes of gray smoke started billowing out of the blower. I quickly turned it off but moments later, every smoke detector within twenty feet of the bathroom started blaring. My cats hid under the bed and my kids started retching from the smell. It may be awhile before I’m brave enough to try a hair blow dryer again. Sadly, I will be returning this product.
Plugged it in to use and it would not turn on, it just began smoking a little bit and got very warm.
This hair dryer stopped working in the first 3 months, after only a couple uses. I would not recommend it.
I thought this was a great deal until I noticed it get so hot that it’s melting it’s own parts!!!
Had this for 2 months. Used it maybe 8 times and this morning it won’t come on.
Lasted a month.

I received this product today, and I am returning it. The reason is that all those things mentioned in the product description do not exist when the actual box arrived. Not a word about the dryer being "ionic" or having "low magnetic wave construction technology helps reduce electromagnetic field radiation by more 50% than other general 1400-1600W hairdryers" written on the box or in the product manual. If you'd like to have just a regular hair dryer, this can be it. But I have zero tolerance for misleading descriptions, so I am returning it.

reviewTitle: Loved it but broke out of no where.
reviewDescription: I used it maybe 3 times and really liked it but it broke while using it one morning, just completely stopped and now it won’t work at all.
It was great until it stopped working 2 weeks in. The quality is exceptionally poor

At first I loved this . Light weight and smaller with power . It’s only been about a month since I’ve been using it . Tonight the cord was so hot to touch and was burning my hand . My dad is was an electrician and said unplug it and throw it out immediately. He said it could have cause a fire and worst case it could have spread to inside my wall . Something is very much wrong with this . Miss my old one I had for so many years .
If you wear rings it scrapes the pink and leaves so many grey streaks
Love the HAIR BOWER ‼️‼️‼️ But NOW IT’S NOT WORKING ???? Can I return????

This dryer was pretty good when it worked. I liked the speeds and temperatures (both lower than my old dryer), but it stopped working after about 3 weeks and began to smell like burning. Now it appears that I cannot get a refund, which is disappointing.
Bought this in November and gifted for Christmas to my daughter. I used it twice on her and now it doesn’t work. Don’t waste your money.

reviewTitle: VERY HEAVY! NOT lightweight as described at all!
reviewDescription: This is the heaviest hair dryer I've ever had! And it's described as lightweight in the title! Nope.Mine also arrived with scratches in the pink color so it looks used. Or just poorly made.I still tried it once to see if I could deal with it because it's super cute looking and supposedly does all the things I want. BUT the defuser is VERY small and did not work for me at all. Also it was hard to get on and off the nozzle too. However it would never fall off on you if you left it on all the time like some though. If you don't need a big diffuser and don't mind the weight it would be great for you.I'm returning this because I can't get past the 2 major flaws since those are my only 2 reasons for buying a new hairdryer!Lightweight and good defuser still needed....Now I'm back in the hunt for another one to try...sigh.

reviewTitle: Poor design, sucked up my hair in back of it.
reviewDescription: It works well, but I have a little longer than shoulder length hair and the motor sucked my hair into the back of it.  It was so bad I had to cut my hair to get it out. Now I have a sizable piece of hair in the back and I can’t get it out because the piece it got caught in doesn’t come off like the filter does. I can’t use if for fear of it catching on fire. I’ve never had a hairdryer do this. My cheap Conair was $20 and is about 20 years old and this never happened. Really disappointed.
The hairdryer came with scratches and dirty. Didn’t want to turn on and when it did the air it blew out smelt super burnt although it does have a strong blow and not as loud as a typical hairdryer.
Very disappointed.  Does not have much power so struggle to get hair dried and it seems kind of awkward handling.
This hairdryer is meh. Does the job just not as quick as I was looking for.

reviewTitle: Super cute and compact but a major flaw...
reviewDescription: Dryer is really cute and compact in size. The diffuser is extremely tiny so it took me a little while to dry my curly (2c/3a) shoulder length hair. All was going fine until the back filter sucked up a piece, thankfully just a tiny bit, of my hair! I did see a review that it also happened to someone else but I didn't think my hair was long enough to have that happen. I had to cup the back of the dryer to protect my hair the rest of the time. I had my previous dryer (an ion brand from sally's beauty) for maybe 8+ years and that never ever happened before. Safe to say, this dryer isn't the one for me or my hair length.
Unfortunately one of the accessorize was always stuck in and I had difficulties to remove it.Also the highest heat burns while the voltage is lower than the one I have at home.

This is a decent hairdryer. I got it on prime day and it came on time. The only problem I have is with the diffusing head on, my hair goes down in it and it pulls my hair and it is extremely scary. I’ve had to change my way of diffusing my hair.
It looks used, clips for the back side were broken.

reviewTitle: It’s heavy and handle is straight hard to use.
reviewDescription: The dryer is too heavy. The handle is straight and very hard to use. Save yourself some money and buy a diffuser for your old dryer. I bought it for my curly hair.
It does scratch easy.  The handle gets hot,  but it dries in a good amount of time.

reviewTitle: comb broke immediately after one use.
reviewDescription: Comb/attachment broke after one use. FYI

I love the power and control of the dryer but I tried the comb attachment and can’t get it off. It should NOT be difficult to switch attachments. Now I am sorry I  bought it.Poor customer services. They have not answered two emails over the past two weeks. I am returning it if they don’t respond by next week. Not acceptable.
Worked great for about a month or so.  Then the heating element went out.

reviewTitle: Product description says it's ionic but I don't think it is.
reviewDescription: It's a nicely designed product that's lightweight and easy to use but several places in the description it says it's ionic and I don't think it is. I wish somebody with the company could tell me.
Bought last July, started using in September. Only used it 2 to 3 times per week. And it’s already broken, coils. Unfortunate , it was my favorite hairdryer, but I wouldn’t buy again.

reviewTitle: Great for two months- then stopped working
reviewDescription: Loved a lot of features on this hair dryer. Small, compact, powerful, quick drying on long hair, and temperature control. Bought it on March 21 and it broke down today- June 28.

reviewTitle: Love it but sadly the heating element broke
reviewDescription: I have curly hair and just recently got bangs. I thought this would help set my hair in the mornings. It was awesome! Small, pretty quiet, light and did a great job. Except it is now June 13th and the heating element broke on the dryer already. Only had it for 3 months. So just be aware you may have a great hair dryer for 3 months and then it might break. :(

reviewTitle: Dont be sensitive if you want it.
reviewDescription: For starters. The colors are amazing! Will give it that. But the heat options are way to hot to keep close to your head. I am a wavy girly myself but i cant keep the difusser up for longer than 5 seconds, and thats not even on the hottest setting. I cant keep it close to my ears because my piercings  will burn my ear. Its just not working for me. Would have send it back if it wasnt for the high rate. There are better ones out there.

reviewTitle: Broke after a month and a half
reviewDescription: It was the best hair dryer I ever had initially. After a month and a half it stopped blowing warm or hot and only blows cold.
I dont know how i feel about this one. It’s not hot enough. Ill be returning.
But it was a challenge to get the hair straightened enough from the drying. It didn't meet my expectations based on my former blow-dryer. Next, I'm going to try the Shark HyperAir blow dryer.

My search was for a hair dryer with a European plug, but I was surprised to receive one with American plugs! :( I may return it.
Lasted 3 months before sparking and almost catching fire.
It stopped working after just 5 months!

I will continue using my Walmart blow dryer, as it does a better job with friz control and shine (I have straight long hair). Both blow dryers drying speed is the same. Needless to say, I was disappointed because I researched and read a lot of reviews.
Can not get the nozzle off the dryer so I can't place it back in the box for storage.
Like the attachments and different settings.
Bought for my daughter and she loves it. Says super powerful and works well.

I like it, it dries fast and it’s lightweight. The only thing I don’t like is it’s really hard to change the attachments. I made the mistake of putting on the comb attachment to try it and I like it, but I could not get that thing off to put on the regular attachment I can’t think of the name of it, concentrator. I pulled, I pried, I tried putting a screwdriver in the crack. Finally, I pulled hard enough and I got it off so the next time I used it I didn’t put it all the way on.

This hair dryer is compact and works well on my thick hair.  I love all the attachments.  I wish it got a little hotter, as I feel like it takes longer to blow dry my hair.  Definitely worth the price.

Although it was not stupid easy to figure out how to turn on the hair dryer, once I did figure it out the experience was worth the wait. It is comfortable to hold and use. I love all the attachments and the color.
I needed a new blow dryer and didnt want to buy an expensive one. This is worth it and does the exact thing as an expensive one lol

reviewTitle: Great for my baby fine hair but not for thick hair girlies!
reviewDescription: Quiet, light weight and worked fine for my thin hair but it is not greatly powerful so would take forever to try thick hair!
It's ok so far
Other than having some difficulty taking the attachment pieces off, I really love this lightweight blow dryer. It works extremely well and is powerful.
Works great
No difference than a normal hair dryer. It gets very hot that's about it, the straightening effect definitely not there. Drying time is quick that's all.

I was given a used or returned one. The label was slapped on the box and was delivered as is on a rainy day. Box was not sealed. The dryer itself looked used - it had scratches and sticky spots. Cute color but ordinary.
Worked great when I purchased last year in August.. Then  suddenly motor blew out. Completely broken now. Didn’t last one year.
I hadn’t even had this product for 6 months and the comb attachment broke and won’t stay attached the blow dryer.

I pulled this out of the box this morning to see that the hairdryer was filthy and covered in small dings that cannot be cleaned off. Not happy at all with this purchase.
I love this product in the beginning but as you can see it is February 29 and my blow dryer has already stopped working.. it’s been eight months… not very happy
LOUD.Looks nice
Worked well for 6 months. Now no hot air. What a waste. Won't be buying this brand again. Don't trust these unknown brands with no track record. I've learned my lesson.

low is pointless sorryhigh is okthe accessories and style are greatwould recommend for anyone sensitive to heat only

For a professional hair Dryer Blow, the handle has no grip and its not easy to man handle. I would not recommend this for person who has natural hair. First time using it the comb would pull-off easily and second time its stayed on a little longer. I am not happy with this product

Daré mi opinión muy honesta ya que siempre me guío por los comentarios de las personas antes de hacer cualquier compra y me gusta mucho cuando son honestos para que así uno puedo tener una compra exitosa.El secador es muy lindo si, no pesa mucho, es moderno. Luego de cada uso, utilizo mi cepillo secador revlon y mejora mucho su textura.
Looks small but is super heavy and get hard to hold
The dryer I received is used not new. It had dents on the on/off button. And the back of the dryer had a burn coil smell in it.
I like the size of this diffuser! Otherwise, it’s not much different than your typical drug store hairdryer. So far so good.
I have purchased several of different types and this one is still working it is small light weight and has several attachments

I’m not good at styling hair at ALL, so I really cannot provide a fair review of its quality in that regard. I can only say that it seems to be a good drier with options for both temperature and air intensity.Be advised, though, that this is not a very small drier and it is not lightweight in my opinion (compared to my last drier which was quite heavy).I got the rose gold, which a pretty color.

reviewTitle: it's ok buthard to change the parts.
reviewDescription: I thought I was going to break my hand first time I put on the diffuser. Very hard to get on and off. The comb thing was even worse. It needs to be easier to do without using all your strength! It dries fine and has cooler heat at the bottom switches.
The hair dryer works just fine, but in the picture there is a comb? and I never received one....also the extra attachments work fine is just very hard to take off. 7.5/10
Blow dryer is very nice for the price. Very light weight. Doesn't get as hot or powerful as some I have used in the past. Overall a good product for the price.

reviewTitle: Decent but wish it had more power
reviewDescription: I looked long and hard before buying this dryer. I chose it because it had great reviews at a good value. I mostly like it but I wish it was more powerful. I have a Rusk W8less and am much happier with that one.
Overall nice hair dryer. I do like each of the attachments. It’s a little heavier than I expected but not too bad. Pretty rose gold color.
Love it! It’s fast and lightweight!

Nice looking, light weight. Different colour options - my only complaint is that it doesn’t get as hot as my other hair dryer. It gets hot but not very hot. I will look for another one through my hairdresser-

I got this dryer because my other one broke when I dropped it. This is easy to use and adjusting the strength and heat are done by a slide switch in the handle. Leaves my hair smooth after drying. It is lightweight and dries my hair fairly fast. Nice pink color!

I absolutely love this hair dryer! I was looking for some thing with a great diffuser to use on my curls. This product came highly recommended on tiktok. I was excited to find it for only $30 on here! The small size makes it super easy to travel with. I was also surprised by how powerful it is and how it cut down my drying time. Besides the diffuser, I’ve actually come to love all the other attachments. I feel like I can finally style my hair using this hairdryer!

Absolutely love it. Light in hand yet powerful. Adjusts easily from hot to warm to cool. Very compact - so superior to my previous tank, which is about 35% larger, yet it dries hair more quickly, thus exposing it to less heat. Easier to maneuver. And inexpensive!

I live this blow drier it's kid friendly it gets hot but it does not burn the ear or scalp it's gets the hair so straight and shiny if you turn it to the max also I live that if u set it to medium it doesn't take your curl pattern away light weight the comb actually stays attached you will bit be disappointed with this purchase

Love the power and settings on this dryer. It has high/ low, and cool/warm/hot. The three attachments are an added bonus, and all have given me great results. It's lightweight and smaller than my previous blowdryer for easy storage or travel.  An overall great buy.

The size, power and volume of this dryer are all great. It’s balanced well in your hand while using. It’s very powerful and dried my thick hair in half the usual time, I live in a humid climate and this has cut down on my time spent drying my hair. The price of the dryer is great, I highly recommend it.

reviewTitle: Pleasantly surprised! Less than 1 min/per section on 4a long hair
reviewDescription: I used this for the first time last night. I presectioned my hair into  4 quartes for 8 sections total with those split in half. Sprayed a Whole Blends moisturizing heat protectant and put them in bantu knots until time to blow dry. I have hair that is completely shrunken when air dried. I'm talking higher than shoulders. When straight in is within 3 inches of my bottom.  I was extremely impressed with this blowdryer. I spent less than 1 minute blow-drying each section. I used a small pump of Garnier fructise frizz/ sleek serum and went to work. It's not as straight as using a paddle brush. I started with that but my hair is took kinky for that. I swapped to this with the comb attachment. That comb is strong. Detangle first and you will be fine. I put tension on the hair by pulling on the section. I straighten my hair twice a year for a trim to even it. This is a champ. I have recommended it to others. We all have rather dense thick curly hair. It's small enough to travel with if that's your thing. My hair feels pretty smooth no doubt aided by the serum used. The cord length was sufficient. So far there isn't anything I dislike. I do wish it came with some kind of storage box or bag to keep it contained. None of them do though. It's a simple, yet strong little blow dryer. It should get the task done for all types of hair.

I never make reviews but after 2 months of having this cute pink blow dryer I came back to share. I have curly hair and the diffusers that I normally buy always end up tangling my hair or they break and fall off, but this one is the perfect size and sturdy. I like that the dryer isn’t too big so it’s easier to pack and the colors are cute of course. The heat options are great and the different head attachments that come with it for this price was cool too.

I have been needing a hair dryer for a while, but was overwhelmed with the super expensive options that are out there! I saw that this one had good reviews, and decided to give it a try! I have been so impressed with how quickly it dries my hair, and I love all the different attachments it came with! It was also really important to me to find a blow dryer that wouldn’t damage my hair, and I’ve been so happy with the different temperature setting options on this hair dryer and how it hasn’t damaged my hair at all! I’m super happy with this purchase and the value!

I have long hair, so drying my hair can take up to 20-30 minutes. Using this hair dryer, it only took me about 10 minutes! The heat and temperature was great! The pressure and power was great too! It’s on the smaller size so it would be easy to pack up for travel. Is came with different attachments, but I’ve only used one so far. It was super easy to use and handle!

Very powerful blow dryer, however it doesn’t get a hot as I would prefer. I have very curly and fine hair that needs a lot of heat to get straight but this one just didn’t do it. It is also very heavy for how small it is.
Even though I didn't do anything special, it broke.
Maybe I received a bad one, but the motor made an awful grinding noise and vibration. Definitely something was wrong. I returned it.

reviewTitle: Change in Model NOT the Same
reviewDescription: I bought one of these in July 2023 and it had a switch for the ion setting. I loved how it worked and since I keep it at my partner's house I wanted one for my house as well instead of carrying it back and forth all the time. I received one for Xmas 2023 and it did not have the ion switch and the first time I tried to use it, all I could smell was something burning and it set off my smoke alarm. Going to have my partner start a return on the new one and will not purchase again.
I bought this about a year ago and it was great. Then this morning the heat stopped working and the temperature button couldn’t be moved. So. I now need a new hair dryer.

This dryer was disappointing.  It had weak airflow even on the higher level.  My 7-year-old Conair that I was replacing had a significantly stronger flow.  I cannot invest the amount of time needed to dry my hair with this unit as it was tedious with the weak air output.

reviewTitle: Quit working less than a year
reviewDescription: I like the style and how light weight it is but the air doesn’t stay hot anymore and I’ve had it less than a year :(

I tried the comb, which works pretty well if you detangle your hair first. 2 minutes in the comb popped off. I decided to use the nozzle, so I swapped them out & grabbed my brush. (I got the version that comes with the wall mounted holder.) I put the dryer on the holder & when I went to pick it back up, the nozzle fell off. I decided to take a closer look at the attachments & noticed that the notches that are supposed to secure the attachments don't secure anything at all. You don't hear a click, & the attachments just keep spinning when you try to lock them in place. I will be returning this after just one use. Very disappointed.
el producto fue comprado como nuevo pero llegó así

The high heat setting is way to hot and fries my hair.  I burned the side of my neck when I bumped it with an attachment nozzle while blow-drying.  Went to the setting 1 lower and it wasn't enough to do much.  The big thing is it made LOUD NOISES WHILE TURNED OFF and plugged into the outlet.  Thank God I heard it before I left.  Who knows what would have  happened!  I have not used it since that day.

Received on June 13 and used it 4-5 times!!! Doesn’t workkkkkk doesn’t turns on!!!

Bought this for my daughter’s birthday. She went to use it for the first and it’s broke. It makes a horrible, loud buzzing/vibrating sound. Super disappointed as my return window is close due to buying it ahead of time.

I have a lot of thick 4c hair and when trying to comb through it was yanking my hair and the way i had to hold it to get it all the way through my hair felt very strange i couldnt get it together by just holding the handle and holding it by the nozzle part i was burning my hand so i had to return it. reviewTitle: No retractable cord, attachments don't stay on
reviewDescription: For any hair dryer to be made without a retractable cord wrap or something to wrap the cord around is ridiculous. The dryer dries okay, but the attachments fall off if you bump it or put under the sink, etc. Cumbersome...

I wanted to love this but wound up giving it away. It is way too hot and my hair became dried out. Not good at all for me. Sorry!UPDATE: the Seller contacted my after reading my review. They asked me how they could help and I replied the only thing I could suggest was to receive a refund since I had already given the blow dryer away. Kudos and many thanks to this Seller! Great customer service and I appreciate it!

The diffuser is just to small in circumference and not at all deep enough to effectively make curls / waves "pop". It is a travel piece so being compact is the point.  If volume and ringlets or waves are the desired result,  stick with the regular sized diffuser,  etc.

reviewTitle: Sparking after only a couple months
reviewDescription: I got this end of Jan and it’s already sparking beg of April. The power isn’t that great either. It worked and I would still use it but not sparking!
I've had this for a few months and it shot sparks out at my hair! I liked everything else about it but really don't want burnt hair!

Fan didn't operate as received.  After checking the ALCI a couple of times I finally slapped it smartly against my hand which freed the fan and it started to work.  It now seems to act normally.  I guess I'll take a chance and keep it.
I like the attachments. I have fine hair so it works well but slower than what I was used to. Nice size for travel and smaller hands.

I am very disappointed in this product. I was extremely excited to receive it and use it! I saw it on tik tok and it looked super great! However, when I plugged it in and turned it on, nothing happened. Item did not turn on at all. Tried it again another day, smoke and a burning smell came out of the dryer. Extremely annoyed because it didn’t even turn on or make any noise.  Do not recommend this product.
I would not recommend for black women with thick hair. I couldn’t fully get my hair blown out. 2/10
I have had for 6 months and the cord shorted out and smells like it’s going to catch fire. It was an ok dryer, wish it would have lasted longer.
Disappointed that hairdryer sparked and died after only 9 months of light use. Would not purchase again.

I received this dryer as a gift: however when opened the box one of the attachments was missing. I sent it back , received refund and got another dryer from them. The new dryer once plugged in ….it starts smoking.Please do not purchase this dryer it’s a safety hazard. I just threw it away and chopped it up as a lost. Don’t waste time purchasing this dryer it’s so awful.

Bought this in mid October, it died yesterday, & it was used sparingly. Some weeks it was used once a week, sometimes it would be every other week (because I have a 2nd hairdryer). And when it was used, it was only used with the diffuser for a few minutes, to get excess moisture out of my hair. Then I finished up with my other hair dryer.The fact that that this dryer died, after very sparse use, after 90 days is ridiculous. Don’t waste your time or money. I’m going back to the same Conair unit that this dryer replaced, after that Conair unit died after 10 YEARS!!  Don’t waste your money on this unit!!  I wish I could give this unit ZERO stars!!

The heating element stopped working after 9 months of use.  Occasional use, only a few times a week. I ordered a new one and the one they sent me didn’t work either.  I just received the replacement for that and it is working, for now.UPDATE: They sent another one and offered a full refund.UPDATE: They changed their mind about the refund!
I’ve only had this for a month and it completely died. Super disappointing.
I loved this hairdryer but after using it for 9 months, it died.

reviewTitle: Stopped Working After A Few Uses
reviewDescription: I’ve had this blow dryer less than 5 months. I haven’t even used it a dozen times and it already stopped working. Based on its lifespan, that makes this one of the most expensive hair dryers you can buy. Very disappointing.
Great blow dryer for less cost.
Definitivamente este secador es una joya,excelente.
Blow drys with ease, very hot
excelente secador de pelo, buena potencia
So in love with the product. Works amazing.
The dryer is a good companion for those who have thick 4c course hair like me! Shampooing my hair takes hours but the drying time was shorter thanks to this effect dryer.

I read a lot of reviews before I purchased a new hair dryer after 10 plus years. I liked the look of the hair dryer the fact that it came in cool colors, and was reasonably priced. I hope this helps.

I didn’t even realize how badly I needed a new hairdryer until I tried this one! I got it because it was on sale not even because I needed it and it is a game changer! As someone with long hair that would never blow dry it because my shoulders would hurt… trust me this one is worth it !
If you have arthritis or can’t light heavy. If you have small hands and can’t hold larger objects, this is perfect 🤩

The hair dryer is highly disappointing. The motor is weak, making it take significantly longer to dry hair compared to other models. The heat settings are inconsistent, and the high setting is often too hot, causing discomfort and potential damage to hair. Additionally, the build quality feels cheap, with a plastic casing that feels like it could crack or break easily. For a more efficient and reliable drying experience, invest in a higher-quality hair dryer.

reviewTitle: Had such high hopes, but seriously let down
reviewDescription: I purchased two of these units: 1 for me, one for my daughter to take to college.  The first unit was used maybe 8 times and now does not blow hot air and only stays in low power.  Naturally it stopped working properly 2 days after return window, and it's impossible to reach anyone at the company.  I'm seriously disappointed and praying the second one doesn't do the same thing.

reviewTitle: Defective hair dryer after a 3 weeks of use.
reviewDescription: I just began using this dryer 3 weeks ago. After 3 weeks of use, the dryer became hot to the touch on the handle when blow drying my hair. And began smelling hot and electrical. My return date was August 20. Unfortunately today is August 24. I guess it was a big waste of money. Please be mindful when deciding to purchase. I don't trust this dryer and won't be using it again.

reviewTitle: Buy if you like the frizzy look
reviewDescription: I bought this because my old dryer quit working. I made a mistake buying this. I have long wavy hair. The only good thing about this dryer is that it is light weight. I don't think it has enough heat to not frizz my hair. I like to have the natural curls. This dryer just made my hair look like Anne Hathaway's in Princess Diaries before she got her make-over.

I've only had this dryer since mid April, blow dry my hair once or twice a week and this thing outta nowhere started with a battle scream then finished off with some smoke and a couple of pops. NEVEREVEN TRIPPED THE SAFETY IN THE CORD. Dangerous as heck and can't get my money back because it's been 30 days and I definitely don't want a replacement flame thrower!! Don't waste your money and if you already bought it; dry with caution!

I ordered  thos Blowdryer  on April14th of this year. I maybe use it 3 times a month.  Lets say naybe 10 times since April 14th.  Yesterday  I was doing my daughters  hair and it started smoking .  Spend the money and get something  better.  This could have ended  badly.  I'm glad it didn't.

After 3 weeks and extremely little use, it no longer works !!!  It is now too late to return and Amazon will not help in any way.  I would HIGHLY recommend you NOT purchase this item!

reviewTitle: Very beat up and unable to use

I tried straightening them out but I’m still worried to use it because I’m afraid it’s not electrically sound and may be dangerous to plug in.

Thankfully it didn’t cause and damage to my hair or my bathroom.Original Review:I was prepared to hate this product and return it. But I wanted to give it a shot. I’m glad I did. at first, it was a great hairdryer! it had a weird kind of smell coming from it and the second time i tried to use it, it didn’t work. i tried multiple outlets and restarting the circuit but it still wouldn’t work.

reviewTitle: Nice and compact, but difficult to change attachments
reviewDescription: The Good:Short barrell (no longer smacking myself in the head like I was with my super long old blow dryer)Heat Settings - The warm setting is warm enough to gently dry your hair without frying it, and nice to have a dedicated cold setting in addition to the 'cold shot' buttonEasy to clean the filter on the backThe OKHandle vibrates a lot more than any other dryer I've used. For short use it's not an issue, but I could see this being a problem for someone using the dryer for long periods of time.The BadI really struggle popping the attachments off. My routine starts without attachments, then I switch to the diffuser. The first week or so I STRUGGLED getting it off. It's a little easier now that it's sort of 'broken in' but can sometimes still require a little wiggling to disconnect.

I really like this dryer and its features. My only issue is the location of the controls. But that is an issue with just about all hand-held dryers I have tried. While using the dryer, my fingers accidentally slip and turn the unit off. This will probably not be an issue as I use the dryer more and gain more experience.The attachments are useful. The teeth of the comb are nice and long.
Machine is loud but very effective and dries hair fast! Recommend!!
Great size but seems to be a little heavier than I like but for most people it's probably just fine!!!
Great heat!  Compact size, but I constantly hit the buttons while using which requires me to stop and reset.

reviewTitle: It’s great for my 4c hair but hard to hold
reviewDescription: This product is awesome with the compact size and multiple attachments but it’s still hard to hold like most blow dryers. If you hold the handle you turn the switches on and off and if you hold the barrel it’s too wide and hard to grip if you have small hands like me.

I bought this to use for travel and I've been pleased. I would not want to use it as my main dryer for regular use because it does take longer to dry my hair. For the price, it is a solid backup and travel dryer and I would purchase again. I especially like the diffuser attachment.
It's a nice blow dryer but as others have said it does need to be more powerful. Gets the job done though. Bought 2 and both still working well after several months.

We paid about half the listing price ($50 at the time of the review) on a sale and felt it was worth it.

reviewTitle: Really gives my hair the smooth volume I like!
reviewDescription: I haven't bought a new hairdryer in, well, MANY years.  My old one was a well known brand, it did the job, I never thought to replace it.  Then the switches started being almost impossible to move from one position to the next (the switches that control temperature and the strength of the fan output).I'm so glad I tried this one!  It has all the new technology that is now incorporated into hairdryers, it's lightweight so easy for me to maneuver to all angles around my head as I dry my hair.  I particularly like the texture that my hair has after using this dryer.  It is smooth but my hair is fuller, and has more body to it.  Perfect!
Love this hair dryer. Has different settings, light weight, and dries your hair in minutes.

I have long, generally straight hair, that usually takes all day to air dry. I used this dryer, without any attachment, and it took less than 5 minutes to dry my hair! It is amazing! I did use a small amount of Argan oil on my hair after I towel dried it, so possibly this helped. The only down to this set it the attachments - they are almost impossible to remove once attached to the dryer.

I have softer and less easy to keep tight curls, so can only speak from my finer hair type experience. That said - I like this a lot. Really easy to define curls without frizz with the curl diffuser attachment and the regular attachment is great for days you want to blow dry it strait or just have loose wave or curl as well. There's another volumizing attachment that only my daughter, who has fine and straight hair, uses and she likes it a lot and says it works well for her purpose of giving volume to straight and fine hair that normally lays flat. The speed and temp options are wonderful and the lowest speed at 2nd highest heat is perfect for defining curls on my hair type without frizz ruining it. I definitely recommend this.

Here’s the thing about that, I’m a very low maintenance curly girl, I air dry my hair 85% of the time, I’d like to say because it’s better for my curls but, honestly it’s more that I hate standing around with hot air in my face and nothing to do. Point is, that means I only blow dry my hair 2-3x a month max. So it has lasted about 25 uses before it went out…. And it wasn’t exactly the best before then. Just avoid it, and if you want a cheap one, run to Target and pick up a Revlon or a Conair. They aren’t as compact or cute BUT I had my Conair for 8 years before it started dying and honestly it did better on its last dying breath than this one did out of the box.

I love this set! Great power and heat and only takes me 4-5 mins to dry my thick curls (: very happy with this product !
