Worth it! I've only used the Yellow and Silver Bird. Both are great products, however I was like for something a little more compact.  Not only is it is compact, it's mighty and most of all cute in design. Love it! My new obsession hair tool!
I have only used the diffuser on this hairdryer but it works so well, it pretty light, the price is good, it can go really hot and cold

reviewTitle: The cool air option is not that cool...  La opción de aire frío no es realmente tan frío....
reviewDescription: [Mis comentarios en Español están al final del texto en ingles]I must say this is a nice small and light weight hair dryer. I loved the perl pink color and the warm air power options were good; I bought it after doing some research based on reviews. However, I had another hair dryer before from a different brand which had the cool air option and that dryer had a really cool blow even when being used at its maximum blowing power. Before that dryer I never looked for this feature before when using other dryers but I must say it is a VERY nice and refreshing feature to use before finishing your hair drying. Therefore, I definitely wanted to have it with my new hair dryer but the "cool" air was just less warm, never really cold or cool, and, as mentioned, felling the cool air before finishing is just too good to not have it. So, I am returning it to probably get one from the brand I previously had. No picture or video can actually show what I am pointing out, but those who have used a really cool air blow option may clearly understand what I am referring to.Debo decir que este es un secador de pelo pequeño y liviano. Me encantó el color rosa perla y las opciones de potencia de aire caliente eran buenas; lo compré después de investigar un poco en función de las reseñas. Sin embargo, antes tuve otro secador de pelo de una marca diferente que tenía la opción de aire frío y ese secador tenía un aire realmente frío incluso cuando se usaba con su máxima potencia de soplado. Antes de ese secador, nunca busqué esta función cuando usaba otros secadores, pero debo decir que es una función MUY agradable y refrescante para usar antes de terminar de secar el cabello. Por lo tanto, definitivamente quería tenerlo con mi nuevo secador de pelo, pero el aire "frío" era menos cálido, nunca realmente frío o fresco y, como mencioné, sentir el aire frío antes de terminar es demasiado bueno para no tenerlo. Entonces, lo devolveré para probablemente obtener uno de la marca que tenía anteriormente. Ninguna imagen o video puede mostrar realmente lo que estoy señalando, pero aquellos que han usado una opción de aire realmente frío pueden entender claramente a qué me refiero.

reviewTitle: Hair Dryer Disappointed, Here is Why…
reviewDescription: First, I think this ionic hair dryer performs admirably for the low price point of $40.00. I like that the cool button delivers cold air promptly unlike my current hair dryer. Also, I like that it has a cool temperature setting, so u can move the switch to this setting and not have to worry about holding down the cold button. It’s convenient for when I want to wrap up my hair styling by locking the follicles in place with blasts of cold air.Moving on, the hair dryer has a moderately powerful engine that delivers a satisfactory amount of air to your hair, but it is less powerful than my current hair dryer.There are two settings for controlling the amount of air flow. Honestly, the slower speed is just too darn slow to be effective at drying my hair in any kind of timely basis. It just doesn’t move enough air even for a slow setting. That leaves the high speed option. For me with hair that isn’t too long, the high speed setting it is good enough. However, others might find having a much less powerful slow air flow setting as problematic.Another downside, for me at least, is that this hair dryer is heavier than I had expected. It’s not like it weighs a ton, but it does weigh almost exactly as much as my larger professional mid-ranged priced hair dryer, much to my surprise. (After re-reading my review, I think that I should cite the cost of my current hair dryer since I’m using it to compare; it cost me $60.00 two years ago.)This is minor, but I also don’t like the power cord on this unit. It’s a regular cord that u might have on any low-end hair dryer. It’s no comparison to the thick long protective power cord on my current hair dryer that resists getting tangled, which is a handy perk.I hadn’t even considered looking at the hair dryer design to check that it had some kind of loop to hang it in my bathroom, which is exactly how I have stored a couple of hair dryers I have gone through over the years. That’s a big problem for me as space is at a premium in my bathroom. I definitely don’t want to have to pull out a hair dryer from below the sink every day to use it.Now, I did by chance find a possible solution while looking at alternative hair dryers. There is a small plastic shelf that u can stick to your bathroom wall. It has an opening in the middle of the shelf for this hair dryer and many types of ionic styled hair dryers to easily slide into; it costs less than $10.00. So that’s a good option that I’m probably going to go with on my next hair ionic hair dryer.Consequently, bc of the weight that I consider to be too much, sadly I’m returning this hair dryer. I have looked at other ionic hair dryers and I selected one that had thousands of positive reviews and that has a price point of $120.00. Obviously, that is a sizable jump in price from this unit; however, I figure I need to spend more if I want a lighter hair dryer with a thicker protective power cord that will not twist itself into a tangled mess.For the price point of just $40.00, u get what u pay for with this hair dryer. It’s not going to be a light weight ionic hair dryer, but it is an ionic hair dryer that will likely deliver much better results to your hair than a similarly priced regular hair dryer that u might find on Amazon or at a box store like Target or Walmart.You know from my review that u aren’t getting a super powerful hair dryer here. It is not bad but it’s still less than great. Therefore, if u have a lot of hair that u need to dry, this unit is not for u. It comes with a couple attachments but no magnetic interface on the dryer. You cannot hang this dryer from a loop on the unit, but u can buy a plastic shelf for a small amount of money that will serve u well I imagine.

I don’t usually leave reviews but I can’t lie it got the job done . How long will it last ? I don’t know but used it on my hair and it felt so smooth after. The settings made it easy to control how much heat goes on my hair . For those who are black natural girls ya know how important that is . I would give 5 stars but the extensions are hard to come off once it’s on and

I had a nice, compact blow dryer for many years without problems.  One day, while using it I smelled smoke!  I unplugged the unit…began an online search for another.After reading about pluses and minuses for a simple little necessity I found this blow dryer!  To my surprise it is twice as heavy to use and a bit awkward.  It works well other than size/weight of unit.

I have curly hair and well.. there are really expensive blow dryers that I did t want to spend the $ on. I thought this would be a great starter. It is durable, the diffuser has short pegs.. that took some getting used to. The dry time is shorter than my other one. I like it but not love it.

As a diffuser/blow dryer for a beginner, this one works and gets the job done. It's very lightweight, has two speed and heat settings, and is relatively quiet. I also love the way it looks, the purple is really sleek and elegant. However, it just wasn't hot or strong enough, and it took me 40 min to diffuse my curly 3a-3c hair (15 min more than my Shark diffuser). I also felt the entire blowdryer vibrate the whole time I was drying my hair which gets that annoying feeling in your hand. I didn't try the other attachments besides the diffuser, but based on the heat the blow dryer reaches, it would make my hair really frizzy and not straighten it. Overall, it was alright, but I will be returning it.

reviewTitle: Doesn’t seem like a brand new product
reviewDescription: Just received my hair dryer, however, it seems as though it’s not new, looks like it’s a product someone returned. There’s something weird and wrong with the paint and hair stuck on it (not mine since I haven’t used it yet).

The blow dryer itself works fine. I like the small size. However, I have thick, curly hair. The diffuser is very small, shallow and creates a lot of frizz in my hair. I will be looking for a universal diffuser to replace it.

reviewTitle: Cute but not as functional as I’d like.
reviewDescription: This did not have near the power as described. Still took the same amount of time as my old dryer.  Maybe my hair was a little smoother but still a little frizzy too.
It’s only been 4 months and it just stopped working 😕 but the seller offered me a full refund. Way to stand behind your product!!

Thank you to the ladies who took the time to make a video of this hair dryer in action. It lives up to all your claims in the demonstrations. I would like to add that the dryer is quieter than it sounds in the videos. I give it the 5 stars with a warning. If you choose to change the concentrator to another attachment before you finish styling, It will be Hot. Use a hand towel to remove it.

So I’ve used it a couple of times since my purchase and I am purposed how well this works. The heat was good, and the compactness of it is amazing. Small bathroom space and fits right into my large toiletry bag with the accessories. The volume was a regular sounding blower. I used it for my curls and straightening my hair and it was a pretty smooth situation. I would say for curls the diffuser was small but I had my own that fit right on it.

Bought this for my daughter’s hair, it works great. She’s 5 and I’m a single dad so I needed something that was easy to use, quick and gets her hair perfect. I appreciate the included attachments and that I can get all the tangles out of her hair. It has more than enough power and keeps her hair soft

I absolutely love this blow dryer. It cuts down the time it takes to dry my hair by more than half. My hair is long and usually takes 2.5 hours to dry, but with this blow dryer, it's dry and straight in just 30 minutes.

This hairdryer has the BEST options for temperature and air flow. I prefer the cooler setting but high air flow. So many hairdryers combine the settings. For example high air flow is only available with high heat. I don't need the heat but if I did it's available. Additionally, the attachments are GREAT and don't fall off! I use the diffuser. The hairdryer is a little heavy which might be an issue for some. It may be a little heavy and bulky for travel. Overall it exceeds my expectations!

I have long, curly hair and this blow dryer is the best I have ever used to define my curls. My curly haired sister in law agrees. I don't know if the ionic whatever makes a difference, but bottom line, it works. Plus, it's just really pretty. (-:

This blow dryer works very well. I love the attachment for the dryer depending on what hair style you want. The heat isn’t too hot and it’s not too cold. So far it’s been working great. This was a good purchase.
I am a salon owner and im loving everything wavytalk, even more than my professional tools. Fell in love with the curling iron so decided to get the blowdryer.. love!

reviewTitle: So far it’s better than my expensive Shark!
reviewDescription: I got an expensive shark dryer about a year and half ago.  I liked it fine but then it started turning off due to over heating. There was no removable filter to clean so i had no choice but to blow in it and turn back on 10x to get my hair dry.This cute and inexpensive dryer dried my hair as quick (or quicker!) than the shark (even when working right) and has a removable filter to clean.  I’ll never get a dryer without one!I hope this little thing works a long time - but even if it doesn’t the cost makes it worth it. I’m a big fan!!
The airflow is strong and warm enough to dry my shoulder length hair quickly but without frying it. It’s small, light, and has a short cord that fits neatly on my counter. Perfect all around.

reviewTitle: One of the best blow dryers
reviewDescription: I have thick 4c hair and this blow dryer is perfect!!! The comb doesn’t detach and it blow drys so easy! I don’t even leave reviews but I was so shocked I have never used a better blow dryer tbh.

My 16 year old was looking for a diffuser, I came across this one with great reviews. Was delivered next morning before she left for school. She is in love with it. Quality is amazing and air flow is great. Highly recommend. It’s also small so it can fit just about anywhere.

This hairdryer is the best by far. I would definitely recommend purchasing. What used to take 15 minutes now takes me on about 6-7 minutes. I hated drying my hair because it took me too long. Not with this hair dryer. I’m thinking of buying one as a spare.

This hair dryer dries my hair so fast!! The heat settings are warmish or lava hot though so the cool blast is definitely needed lol. Even using the highest temperature doesn’t create fly aways as long as you aim the hairdryer downward to smooth them. I’d recommend this absolutely!!

I was very skeptical with this not being a known brand to me. I took a chance and ordered this to dry my mane. I have medium length thick hair and on average it can dry it in under 5 minutes! I was sold! Great blow dryer! And the attachments all fit well also. Great size and not heavy at all! Great buy!!
I read about this type of hair dryer technology can reduce frizz and for me it definitely helps. I dry it on the low heat setting and it works great.

I bought this on a whim and I'm glad that I did. It's lightweight and quieter than my old hairdryer, but it dries my thick hair in a timely fashion. Very happy with this purchase and have recommended it to others.
Easy to handle.  Doesn’t take my 4c hair long to get dry. I keep hitting the buttons on the hadle and turning the heat down.  And the comb doesn’t fly off. A definite buy again.
there’s actually nothing bad i can say about thisit has good heat control, good weight, good air flow and power, and the buttons are easy to control

bought this to replace my 10 year old dryer and i honestly think the old one works better than this one does.

It's too late for me to return it, but I would if I could.I like the attachments that came with it.  It's got a few settings for temperature and power, and a cool shot button.  I like all of those things too.
Not as good as the 18 year old Conair that died.  Wouldn't buy again.

I guess it is a good hair dryer, just overpriced for the plain technology.I will return it, and have 3 stars as I have been asking customer service for details with no luck.
I expected it to have more power. It is fairly weak.

I killed my last blow dryer that I loved by overheating it drying out my car carpets.I was looking specifically for quiet hairdryers, and it seems kind of loud, plus the handleis skinny and slippery, and feels a litle top heavy.I wish I would of gotten another type of 'quiet' hairdryer.

I bought this dryer 6 month ago.  The dryer itself is great.  The plug however, is made of cheap plastic that easily cracks and falls apart making the dryer useless.  If the manufacturer can step it up on the plastic used, this really would be a really good dryer.

it’s okay. Not the best but it gets the job done if you are looking for something on the cheaper side. I really like the brush attachment. I feel like it gave me a blow out look with my front of my face.

I had this dryer for a year and it broke. No biggie as it’s affordable. So I ordered a new one—completely different. Does not have the option of ionic or no ionic and not working as well on my wavy hair.

reviewTitle: Sirve para lo que lo quiero, esperaba más calor
reviewDescription: Lo compré para secar mis rizos, por eso no me preocupa tanto si es muy caliente. Si lo estás buscando para estilizar lacio y quieres un blower potente, este no es la opción. Para cosas más soft funciona bien.
I liked this hair dryer a lot, but the button on the left is stuck and the dryer will not get hot. This literally just happened a year later after I bought it.
Took too long to dry my hair. Tried the comb, very awkward. Used the diverter attachment otherwise it felt like no air flow. Not worth the money to me.
Fresh out of the box, doesn’t work and the back side is completely broken. I ordered a replacement because all previous reviews said it was a great product.
I do not notice any exceptionalism about this hair dryer, in either being more quiet or faster to dry.It is fine and positively, absolutely nothing special.

reviewTitle: Not bad for price and size
reviewDescription: So far, I don't totally dislike this blow dryer but I don't love it.Pros:- It is powerful and blows a lot of air for being as small as it is.- It's pretty and small so it doesn't take up a lot of space.Cons:- The handle is a little too short so it's easy to hit the 'cool' button while drying your hair.- It doesn't seem to get very hot even on the highest setting
sometimes this sort of lightning comes out when its at its full speed, kinda scary

reviewDescription: But… I only received two out of three attachments. I didn’t receive the most important one in my book the comb attachment. Otherwise the blower is powerful but not too loud and it is lightweight. It’s so difficult to find comb attachments that fit and are sturdy. Can someone point me in the right direction for the correct size attachment?

reviewTitle: NOT RECOMMENDED FOR MEDIUM TO LONG HAIR WHEN USING DIFFUSER.
reviewDescription: Please see below of review for updated complaints.So far I love this hair dryer. It's nice, it's a little slimmer then traditional dryers. The color is vibrant, the attachment pieces (diffuser & concentrator nozzle) fit snug. Please follow the directions on the box it comes in, because I noticed it mentioned NOT to use the highest heat setting & the highest air flow setting at the same time with the attachments on. I will include that other buyers have complained of their hair getting caught in the back end filter NOTED that this complaint is stated on the back on how to avoid that, but I do understand that girls with long hair will most likely have this problem. I have medium length hair that is dense but fine and I wanted something smaller then traditional hairdryers due to my arms being short. I will update if something goes wrong with this product.Complaints:1.The switches to turn on the hair dryer do not match up with the air flow/heat setting you're going for. That could be more of a spot on thing.2. When using the diffuser I have to section my hair & diffuse that way or else my hair will get sucked onto the vent. (You would really have to try to get your hair caught into the fan, but its possible through the vent. So the fear of my hair being sucked to the vent is a huge downfall to me.I tested both hairdryers ( this one and my 10yr old Conair) & this one sucked my hair to the vent more than my Conair.

reviewTitle: Bigger than it looks, heavy, and not powerful.
reviewDescription: Bigger than it looks, is heavy and isn't very powerful.

Ok... I've used my dryer around ten times, and I can't take the comb off, and I have to press really had on the switches to control the heat, and powering. The switches get stuck badly... It dries well, but it's hard to remove the comb once on if you have any type of arthritis, or wrist problems.

As a full time hairdresser this dryer is heavy. It was advertised as light.The cord length is really to short.It blows really good and is easy to use.For home use it’s good.I ordered and received 2 dryers, one as a gift one as a replacement at work.

I bought this Sept of 2023 and now it’s April 2024 and it started smoking and died. I don't even use it every day and always on the low setting. Think it should last longer than that!Update: this is the best company, they contacted me and refunded my money without me even asking, I didn’t even ask for a refund. They stand behind their products and are just great. I will definitely buy from them again in the future!
My blow dryer was doing great I loved it! But yesterday when I plugged it in it did not work… I press the reset button and did all the troubleshooting, it is totally dead!
I am giving the product 3 out of 5 stars because it arrived scuffed up and scratched. It’s obvious this wasn’t a new product I purchased. The blow dryer works just as it should.

reviewTitle: The diffuser isn't snug and hair gets caught
reviewDescription: This blow dryer is good if you don't have to use the diffuser. The diffuser snaps in place but there is a small gap where hair can get caught. If you are someone who doesn't use the diffuser every time and will be taking it on and off, it won't last too long. The small plastic edge that snaps it in place will break. There also is not a hook to hang this dryer. There are positives: it dries quickly, the size is great, the back of the dryer has very small holes and doesn't snag hair or suck it in.

This blow dry works well. However, beware that it could be dangerous around long hair. This blow dryer has sucked in hair twice. The first time it happened I put it down to user error and in the future I had to be more careful. However, today I was drying my 5 y.o. Nieces hair which is super long and it happened again. This time the suction power of the dryer pulled her hair in from a good distance. I was being careful, running it on the lowest settings and I was not distracted. The damage was minimum because it was only 10 strands of hair but the fear was real. It pulled the hair in with force. I was lucky that I reacted quickly and was able to turn it off before it pulled closer to the rest of her hair and sucked more in. It’s a great diffuser hair dryer for rollers or scrunched curled hair but I won’t be using around young children or to blow dry loose straight hair. I think it’s due to the lack of a rounded back air intake and removable filter. I warn folks to make sure young children aren’t allowed to play with the blow dryer or be allowed near it while unsupervised and it’s plugged in. Save yourself the tears.

The product itself, and the attachments that came with it were both good, while not as quiet as I was, hoping for, much quieter than my last one! Fairly happy with the different options, and the appearance of the hairdryer. However! The wall mount that they send with the hairdryer will not support the hairdryer itself, i was moving and so waited a few months to mount the hair dryer and just recently had the opportunity to. It was one of the reasons I purchased this particular model in order to get that additional benefit of being able to mount it on my wall. Unfortunately I attached it to the wall. Left it for a full 24 hours to adhere.  Then put the hairdryer on it and came back to find the hairdryer and the mount on the floor with the hairdryer having sustained damage in the fall. I hate this, as this is one of the reasons I purchased this particular option, and now my hairdryer is damaged due to using the products that were all included.
For a brand new dryer it isn’t very powerful, it heats nd cools well but it doesn’t push air much. It’s very cute though

I bought over 3 months ago. Today the heat went out. The dryer works still, just no heat anymore. I'm so bummed cuz i loved this dryer. I'd say it's a 5star dryer, but the fact that it didn't make it to 6months when It cost $40 is ridiculous. I'm outside of return window, $40, & a hair dryer during a work week. I use a dryer 5-7days a week. Thank goodness I had an old $10crap basic dryer that's yrs & yrs old that still works for backup. I just like a dryer with features like this one. I'm so bummed it didn't last...***update** the seller issued me a new dryer free of charge. I'm glad to have a blow dryer again& appreciate the extra mile that was done by seller to make things rightm
Had it for a year and a half worked well until it starting sparking. Was hoping it would have lasted longer.

I read the reviews on this product and several others before I finally made my decision.  For the first week or so the hairdryer was great and the attachments were exactly what I wanted.  A few weeks ago I messaged the seller asking what can be done as the attachment I use daily just falls off as I'm using it.  I have to wait a few minutes to attach it again as it is very hot.  Its to the point now it falls off every few seconds I'm using the hairdryer.  The thing that bothers me the most is the seller just ignores your concern .  The hair dryer is decent and does what I was hoping to find but the hair attachments is what I really am aggravated about since I use it daily to eliminate frizz.  Do your homework before buying from this seller.
Unfortunately The outlet plug doesn’t stay in the wall. It falls out when you’re using it.

I found the dryer to be satisfactory, however, as someone with curly hair, the diffuser attachment broke after only four uses. The other attachments functioned as expected, but the diffuser's durability was lacking.
Takes me a long time to dry my hair. I wish I would’ve purchased another Conair dryer because they are much more powerful. It also shows scratches really easily because it’s matte.
It works but the two switches that are almost one switch is some what flimsy. It works but isn't near as good quality as most of my past dryers.
The various attachments securely attach, but they don't stay still, meaning that they rotate during use. This is particularly frustrating when using the directed flow nozzle

I do think you get value for money with this hair dryer. I wish the user manual was a bit more user friendly, I could have missed it but I didn't see how to attach & remove the different parts. I wasn't sure if I should screw it on/ off or pull. I eventually figured it out. I haven't use the diffuser attachment as yet but the other two attachments work fine. I wish there was a carrying case that came along with this hair dryer. Also, I know it says in the user manual what the cool button is for but i still don't really get or feel any difference but I'm also not very knowledgeable in hair care styling. All i know is a hair dryer is to dry hair...lol. But all and all I think its a good hair dryer and value for money. I think its a good buy & it seem like it will be one that will last me awhile. I'm happy with my purchase, maybe I use need to read more on the product description to understand the cool button.

reviewTitle: The COMB NOZZLE is stuck. Can anybody help me?
reviewDescription: I installed the nozzle for the first time, like the other accessories...But I can't take it out anymore. Maybe it happened to someone? Help please.
As a professional of 20 years, I absolutely HATE how short thr cord is. It ruins the entire blowdryer for me
Have not had a year and this morning I had Sparks coming out of the cord thatis inside dryer.

reviewTitle: Disappointed... it is not quiet at all
reviewDescription: It will dry my hair, but it is NOT quiet.  Won't fall for this brand again
Stopped working after a month and a half! Awesome product but not worth it!

reviewTitle: Does not work for all hair types
reviewDescription: I brought this dryer for daughter who has thick 4b hair.  It didn’t work well at all😔
Left my hair frizzy. Really heavy. I really do not recommend this blow dryer

The dryer is very cute and I really like the color.  It has 3 heat settings and 3 speeds which is very nice.  It seems to take much longer to dry my hair than with my old dryer and my hair ends up much more frizzy and poofy. I ended up ordering the same one I used to have and will be donating this one.

I had this blowdryer for a little over 6 months. For the most part I was happy with it. My only complaint was that I kept accidentally turning it off due to the location of the buttons. However, tonight I went to turn it on and it wouldn't turn on. I reset the cord and finally I got it to work. After 10 seconds it sparked and burnt my arm. I smelled smoke and immediately unplugged it. My husband tried turning it on again and the same thing happened. I will not be using it again. Not taking any chances and burning myself again, let alone possibly burning my house down. Unfortunately it's outside of the return window. I wish I would have gotten more than 6 months out of it. Giving three stars because I didn't have a problem with it until tonight.
Not really impressed. Advertises makes waves.Works like all hair dryers

It’s cute, however the quality isn’t the best. My hairdryer sort of fell like a foot and a half off the table and I caught it and after that the mesh filter on the back refuses to go back on properly. Pretty janky product. The temperatures are good and easy. I wish it came with a wall mount of something.

It was okay but the shaft that you have to hold is too short. My hands are average size and when just holding the blow dryer while using  I often accidentally push the switches.  I have never experienced that with any other dryer. This might be good for a pre-teen's first hair dryer.

I had high hopes for this hair dryer just it seemed to fail in a lot of categories. While the dryer is very light and small it takes a long time to dry hair and had a funny smell to it. The attachments felt cheaply made and overall didnt meet my expectations.

It seems petty review but, sometimes we hang blow dryers on hooks, don't we? I have to lay it on the counter when not in use. Thinking about cable ties, maybe a rubber band. Kind of hate it for that reason.
This is a good little blow dryer but one slip into the sink from the counter and 2 of the 3 little prongs that hold the back on broke.  It is made with very light weight plastic.

Update: 1 star to 3 stars. The company sent me a new hairdryer free of charge. They did not ask for a review change, but I think it is worth noting that the second hair dryer works just as well as the first. I'm still using it and love it. It might just be a bit of a gamble whether or not the one you get will work long term. But it's a really good hair dryer for the price!Original: I would have given this 4 or 5 stars, but one day the highest speed stopped working for no apparent reason. I only used it twice a week heavily, and maybe a minute each day. So I can't attribute it to overuse. My husband actually took it apart and said it was a component issue, and not something that could be fixed or was somehow knocked loose.Bummer because it was pretty amazing at first. Dried my hair fast fast and the ion part was nice.

reviewTitle: Breaks if it falls on floor
reviewDescription: Dryer was good but it fell on my bathroom floor one time and now it won't turn on.  That is looney.  I have dropped my phone 6 times in the 3 years I have had it and it hasn't broken and that is much more delicate.  This should expect to be accidently knocked off a sink and survive.  Wouldn't recommend for traveling because of that.
The dryer is heavy and didn't concentrate the airflow like I had hoped

Love this hair dryer.. all the temp and speed settings the weight the ease of usen all the things BUT I did Not get what I ordered and paid for! I got the hair dryer and one attachment(the difuser).. the comb & concentrater attachments were just missing🤷🏼‍♀️ but bc I ordered it for a trip I can't return it bc I had to use it the day it came I had no other choice so I am VERY irritated that I paid for something but only got a couple pieces of it. It sucks that I have to leave a not so great review for a product I really do like but can't love it all the way bc I don't have it all

reviewTitle: Not as freat as some of the reviews stated
reviewDescription: Pros: it’s lights weight. The best come attachment that I’ve used in awhile.Cons: button placement causes you to accidentally adjust settings while using.Cord is very short for a blow dryer.Those are deal breakers with me, and why I will have to return.

reviewTitle: Cool button in an awkward spot
reviewDescription: Works well and not too noisy but it is kind of heavy and the cool air button is right where you hold the hair dryer, so I find my dryer going cool a lot since I’m accidentally pressing on that button with my hand.

reviewTitle: Very heavy dryer - had to return it
reviewDescription: I didn't even use so I can't comment on how it works. As soon as I opened the box and held the dryer, it was the heaviest styling tool I've ever held and it's just not practical for me.

reviewTitle: Practical, but diffuser gets caught on my hair.
reviewDescription: I love the functionality of this hair dryer. I bought one previously at a higher price point and this one works just as good. The only complaint that I have is that due to the diffuser being made of a cheap plastic material it has not so smooth edges. My 3c curls some times get caught in the diffuser when pulling the diffuser away from my hair, which disturbs my curls and cause some frizz and could pull my hair out if I’m not careful.  I wish that the edges on the openings of the diffuser were smoother. But this is my only complaint.

reviewTitle: Gets hair dry but not smooth or shiny.
reviewDescription: I was really excited about trying this dryer based on reviews for the price point after my Chi died. I was highly disappointed. My hair was not sealing with cold shot so it was not smooth after 5 minutes or so and became frizzy and wavy. Good effort but it's a cheap blow dryer.I ended up returning this and got another Chi that always added shine and kept my hair straight with low EMF. Considering another Chi for Ulta beauty is only $10 more I shouldn't have tried to be cheap, you get what you pay for!
I think this would be good for curly hair and using a diffuser. The air it blows out is not powerful. I returned it.

I was very surprised that this works so well. It has a lot of power for a small dryer. Dried quickly. The only downside is if using the attachment, the attachment gets quite hot but hot where it would burn the hairI would definitely recommend it and would purchase again

Love the blow dryer power, wish it had a better comb attachment and the cool button placement sucks because where I need to grip the handle is where it's at so I'm constantly pushing it and having to shift the way I hold it which doesn't feel as comfortable for me.

I always wait a bit to do my review to make sure it holds up and this has not. Delivered Dec 30 and its March 24 and it already has messed up. It seems to have lost high speed and only has low. It is not a good blow dryer and now i have to go buy another one. Not happy at all!!!Customer service contacted me and made it right. Hopefully the next one works longer than this one. Was very nice and helpful.

I literally chose this brand (among similar items) because of the color. It's more of a muted pale pink color and it was peeling as soon as I opened it. Other than that, it gets the job done, and I only plan to use it 4-6 times/month (4C natural hair).In true millenial cringe core, I will be saving the box.
I needed  a new hair dyer that was strong and compact. This one is perfect for me. My daughter used it and was happy with how fast it dried her hair. Good buy worth the money.

reviewTitle: I like the color but do not like how it turns on
reviewDescription: I am not sure how to use some attachments .  Mostly I'm pleased with my purchase

I've used the same giant Revlon hair dryer since High School, so over 10 years now, and wanted a new lightweight one. This did not disappoint! It's light, easy to use, and I like that the barrel is shorter. My only gripe is that the cool shot isn't very cold.
Nice lil blow dryer . I like the use of the attachments, they also easy to take off or put on

I've had this dryer for 7 months. It's different than any dryer I've ever used. It does have a strong gust, but it isn't concentrated for good styling precision. I can just blow all my hair around like a whirlwind and it does get fairly dry. It's strong, but not directional if that makes sense. I use it 2-3 x a week on partially air-dried hair, so it doesn't take long. I used it tonight and I put it on high heat with high blowing and immediately it smelled toasty. Which kinda worried me. It smelled like something was burning. It wasn't right. I bought a new dryer after that. (Edit) company was very gracious and offered me a full refund of the purchase price of the dryer. Added 2 stars for excellent customer service. I didn't even ask for the refund.

So I’m new and finally embracing my crazy frizzy mess of hair that I have brushed out daily for years after a shower. I don’t really like air drying because I’m still learning what to do. I decided to order a dryer with a diffuser and tried it out as soon as I got it. Definitely a back breaking process, but I love the different speed options and heat options. It did a great job drying my hair and look at the lil baby curls I got going on 🤪 Cant wait to continue using this as I learn more about how to do my hair!
